mapper.insert: insert into member(userId, userPw, userNick, email, userName, birth, phoneNum, gender) values(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userNick}, #{email}, #{userName}, #{birth}, #{phoneNum}, #{gender})
mapper.select: select * from member where userId = #{userId} and userPw = #{userPw}
mapper.update: update member set userNick = #{userNick}, phoneNum = #{phoneNum}, email = #{email} where idx = #{idx}
